Building a safe and respectful community

Treat all community members with respect and kindness. Harassment, discrimination, or abusive behavior
                will not be tolerated.

Provide accurate descriptions and photos of your items. Misrepresenting items or their condition is not
                allowed.

Always meet in safe, public locations for item exchanges. Use our secure payment system for all
                transactions.
Treat borrowed items with care and return them in the same condition you received them.

If you encounter any problems or violations of these guidelines, please report them to our support team
                immediately.
We're here to help you with any questions
Looking for quick answers? Check out our Help Center for common questions and solutions.

Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our
                website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and improving
                our services.
Required for the website to function properly
Help us understand how visitors interact with our website

You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Please note that removing or blocking cookies can
                impact your user experience and parts of our website may no longer be fully accessible.
Learn the basics of using Krili
How do I list an item for rent?

Click the "List Item" button in the navigation, fill out the item details, upload photos, and set
                    your rental price and availability.

All payments are processed securely through our platform. Renters pay upfront, and owners receive
                    payment after successful item return.
What if an item gets damaged?

We offer protection for both renters and owners. Report any damage immediately, and our support team
                    will help resolve the issue.
How do I cancel a rental?

You can cancel a rental up to 24 hours before the start time for a full refund. Check our
                    cancellation policy for more details.
Rent anything, anytime in just a few simple steps
Find the perfect item using our search filters or browse by category.
Message the owner to ask questions and arrange pickup details.
Select your dates, pay securely, and get ready to enjoy your rental.
Use the item and leave a review to help the community.
Take photos, write a description, and set your rental price.
Receive rental requests and communicate with potential renters.
Meet the renter in a safe location and hand over your item.
Receive payment automatically after successful item return.

No hidden fees, just fair pricing for everyone

You pay the rental price set by the item owner plus any applicable
                    taxes. No additional fees from Krili.

You keep 85% of each rental payment. Krili takes a 15% service fee to
                    cover payment processing, insurance, and platform maintenance.

All payments are processed securely through our platform with
                    industry-standard encryption.

Comprehensive coverage is included at no extra cost to protect both
                    renters and owners.

We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, list an item, or
                contact us for support.
We use the information we collect to:
Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process transactions and send related information
Send you technical notices and support messages
Communicate with you about products, services, and events

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your
                consent, except as described in this policy.

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized
                access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
